articles.author: CBC News
articles.title: Be 'ready to pivot' domestic holiday travel plans amid rapidly spreading omicron variant, medical experts say | CBC News
articles.description: The rapidly spreading omicron coronavirus variant of COVID-19 means Canadians may have to rethink and be 'ready to pivot' their travel plans within the country during this holiday season, medical experts say.
articles.content: The rapidly spreading omicron coronavirus variant means Canadians should be "ready to pivot" their travel plans within the country during this holiday season, said medical experts studying COVID-19.… [+5123 chars]
